card.meanings: <meaning transcription="あく romaji="aku">to open, to become open
<meaning transcription="あさって romaji="asatte">day after tomorrow
<meaning transcription="あそぶ romaji="asobu">to play, to make a visit
<meaning transcription="あつい romaji="atsui">hot to the touch
<meaning transcription="あびる romaji="abiru">to bathe, to shower
<meaning transcription="ある romaji="aru">to be,to have (used for inanimate objects)

<meaning transcription="いつか romaji="itsuka">five days, fifth day

<meaning transcription="うまれる romaji="umareru">to be born
<meaning transcription="おおきい/おおきな romaji="ookii/ookina">big

<meaning transcription="おじさん romaji="ojisan">uncle, middle aged gentleman
<meaning transcription="おす romaji="osu">to push, to stamp something

<meaning transcription="おととし romaji="ototoshi">year before last
